greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A Von Koch curve related to the Golden ratio.
link: Benoit Cloitre, Plot of a(n) for n=1 up to 1362772
formula: a(n) = 2*sum(k = 1, n, sum(i = 1, k, b(i)))-n*(n+1)/2, where b(k) = floor(phi*k)-2*floor(phi*k/2)
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Jun 17 2003
